transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, Sadul sir, Sunil baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha boliye Sunil ji.
Executive: Humne abhi na ek meeting kiya hai aapke catalog ko leke puri IndiaMART team ke sath mein to humne chezo ko observe kiya hai ki IndiaMART ki side se na aisa kuch bhi technically problem nahi aa raha hai jiski vajah se aapki company ko lead hamper ho sir. Because humne listing bhi check kiya ki agar student abakashan search kare to aapki company hamare portal pe kahan pe dikh rahi hai waha pe bhi acha dikh raha tha company apna listing. Also jo by ka report hai sir ek basic supplier ko jo TrustSeal plan chalata hai uski reports humne cross check kiye to dusre suppliers ko jo bhi abakashan kaam karte hai na unko lead kam hi ja raha hai aapki company se matlab bahut limited ja raha hai. But lead ki us report ke according bhi aapki company ko hum kafi wo share kar pa rahe hai.
Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai. To abhi hamara jo observation hai ki market ke basis pe hi thoda sa lead ka flow up down ho raha hai. Aap thoda sa na patience ke sath workout kijiye sir aur sure isme bhi hume cheeze nikal ke aayegi positive.
Hmm.
Executive: Baki baki na Sabita aapke sath abhi coordinate karegi connect karegi isme na jo aapki products hai na sir jaise ki aapka ek product hai ek second main aapko batata hu ye wooden abakash karke ek category hai theek hai. To iske kuch product agar hum lagega ki kuch product aur add on karna padega ye catalog ka jo quality score hai wo 57 pe hai to agar usme kuch improvement ka lagega to Sabita aap se connect karegi please aap kuch details provide kar sakte hai.
Customer: Theek hai kar dete hai kar dete hai. Baki baki mera number aapke pass hoga sir personal number.
Executive: Ha ha. Hai na to aapko still agar kuch bhi lage concern apne ko doubt lage to aap mere number pe directly call back kar lijiyega sir.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai sir.
Executive: Hai na baki aap befikar rahiye sir main apni side se khud aapke catalog ko handle kar raha hu abhi main apni side se best try karunga ki kuch bhi mujhe single time me glitch laga usko as soon as correct karunga sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir cool.
Executive: Hai na aapki party ka impact nahi layega sir please positive.
Customer: Thank you. Koi problem nahi chaliye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's company leads are being hampered.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the company's listing on the portal.

- Executive assured to resolve any glitch.

- Executive informed Sabita will coordinate regarding product details.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, leads, listing, products
